title: The Taxi driver
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Louis Portugais and Jean Roy
brief_description: Accompanies Gerry Lane, a taxi driver, on a few rides and presents a sampling of the parade of people, of all types and temperaments, that pass in and out of his cab in endless procession, all with very personal concerns but all with one thing in common - a desire to get somewhere in a hurry.
